questions.question: Can I change plans anytime?
questions.answer: Yes — Upgrade or downgrade directly from your dashboard at any time.

questions.question: What payment methods are supported?
questions.answer: We accept credit cards and SEPA payments; billing is flexible (monthly or annual).

questions.question: Is there a setup fee?
questions.answer: No setup fee. Everything you need is included in your plan.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: No refunds. We offer a 7-day free trial so you can test risk-free.

questions.question: What if I exceed plan limits?
questions.answer: We'll notify you and recommend proactive next steps, such as upgrading.

questions.question: Can I export my site?
questions.answer: No. Naveeg is a fully managed platform—secure, hosted in the EU, GDPR-compliant.

questions.question: Is my site GDPR compliant?
questions.answer: Yes—Secure hosting, SSL, and EU data storage are standard across all plans.
